pr_title: Bring samples checkstyle in sync with root checkstyle version

timeline.message: bring samples checkstyle in sync with root checkstyle version

timeline.bodyText: I think we need tabs here. :)
timeline.author: meltsufin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -79,7 +79,8 @@
 							<dependency>
 								<groupId>io.spring.javaformat</groupId>
 								<artifactId>spring-javaformat-checkstyle</artifactId>
-								<version>0.0.9</version>
+                                <!-- Keep in sync with spring-javaformat-checkstyle.version in pom.xml -->
+                                <version>0.0.25</version>

replies.bodyText: sheesh. Checkstyle could have told me, ya know?
replies.author: elefeint
